Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides grant funding, where available, for broadband services in non-competitive locations
Summary: Provides grant funding, where available, for broadband services in non-competitive locations through the ConnectAll deployment program.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to the provision of grant funding for broadband services in non-competitive locations
